subScenes.name: 问候与确认
subScenes.description: 租车柜台初遇，确认预订信息

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! Can I get your last name for the reservation?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您好！能告诉我您的姓氏以便核对预订吗？

responses.text: Sure, it's Wang.
My last name is Wang, and I booked under that name.
responses.text_cn: 我姓王，预订时用的就是这个名字。

responses.text: Wang. Got it?

qaPairs.speakerText: You've got a compact car reserved under John Wang. Is that right?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您预订的是约翰·王的紧凑型车，对吗？

responses.text: Yep, that's me.
Actually, my first name is Jian, not John. Could you check again?
responses.text_cn: 其实我叫健，不是约翰，能再核对下吗？

responses.text: Yeah, correct.

qaPairs.usageNote: 名字不符时及时纠正，避免取错车

qaPairs.speakerText: We recommend the full coverage package—it covers scratches, theft, and accidents.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们推荐全险套餐，涵盖刮蹭、盗窃和事故。

responses.text: I'll take it. How much extra?
Nah, I'm good with basic. My credit card covers collision.
responses.text_cn: 不用了，基础险就行，我的卡已含碰撞险。

responses.text: What's the difference between basic and full?
responses.text_cn: 基础险和全险有啥区别？

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确自己已有保障再决定是否加保

qaPairs.speakerText: The basic one doesn’t cover tire damage or windshield cracks.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 基础险不保轮胎和挡风玻璃损坏。

responses.text: Oh, then I’ll go with full coverage.
Can I add windshield coverage only?
Got it, I'll skip it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 针对高风险项可选附加险，灵活搭配

subScenes.name: 车辆升级
subScenes.description: 询问是否可免费或付费升级车型

qaPairs.speakerText: We’ve got a free upgrade to an SUV if you’re interested.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们有免费升级到SUV的选项，有兴趣吗？

responses.text: Really? That’s awesome—I’ll take it!
Is it bigger inside or just taller?
responses.text_cn: 是空间更大还是只是更高？

responses.text: No thanks, compact’s fine.

qaPairs.usageNote: 免费升级要果断接受，但先问清差异

qaPairs.speakerText: If you want a luxury sedan, it’s $30 extra per day.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果您想要豪华轿车，每天加30美元。

responses.text: Hmm, I’ll stick with the SUV. Thanks though!
Can I upgrade for just one day?
Nope, too pricey.

qaPairs.usageNote: 付费升级要权衡使用天数和实际需求

subScenes.name: 取车与还车
subScenes.description: 确认取车地点、时间与还车流程

qaPairs.speakerText: Your car’s in lot C, level 2—just follow the signs.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您的车在C区二层，跟着指示牌走就行。

responses.text: Got it. What time do I need to return it?
Is there a shuttle to lot C?
C2, got it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 取车地点要确认具体区域和楼层

qaPairs.speakerText: You’ve got to return it with a full tank, and we’ll check for damage.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 还车时油箱必须加满，我们会检查车况。

responses.text: Okay, I’ll fill up before returning.
What if I don’t fill it? How much do they charge?
responses.text_cn: 如果不加满，会收多少费用？

responses.text: No problem.

qaPairs.usageNote: 务必问清油量要求，避免被高额收费

subScenes.name: 道别与提醒
subScenes.description: 最后确认联系方式与紧急援助

qaPairs.speakerText: Here’s your rental agreement and the 24/7 roadside assistance number.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这是您的租赁合同和24小时道路救援电话。

responses.text: Thanks! Can I save this number in my phone?
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！我能存到手机里吗？

responses.text: Got it. Appreciate your help!
Is this the only number?

qaPairs.usageNote: 务必保存救援电话，关键时刻救命

qaPairs.speakerText: If you have any issues, just call this number—no need to come back to the counter.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果出问题，直接打这个电话，不用回柜台。

responses.text: Perfect! I’ll keep it handy.
What if I’m in a different city?
responses.text_cn: 如果我在别的城市怎么办？

responses.text: Cool, thanks!

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认远程支援是否全国通用
